Link Bubble no puede compartir este objeto porque no es un URL válida
Incapaz de encontrar aplicación. Considera cambiar la acción de la burbuja en Ajustes.
Link Bubble se ha seleccionado como navegador por defecto.
Cuando cualquier burbuja se ha terminado de cargar
Usado cuando una o más aplicaciones (no navegadores web) de tu teléfono pueden actuar con una URL.\n\n Toca para eliminar cuál actúa por defecto
Cuando una o más aplicaciones (no navegadores) pueden abrir el link, puedes configurar cual la abrirá por defecto .\n\n
Redirige a la cuenta de Google
Redirigir al navegador por defecto links de accounts.google.com
Link Bubble debe ser utilizado como navegador por defecto para funcionar. Toca para configurar
Aviso: La restricción para abrir links desde una única app solo existe con la versión gratis de Link Bubble. ¿Volverse Pro?
Link Bubble se ha configurado para cargar links de %1$s.\nPara cargar links de todas las apps, conviertete a Pro.
Comprueba los vídeos de Youtube incrustados
Muestra un atajo para reproducir los videos incrustados de Youtube
Aviso: Las burbujas abiertas se volverán a cargar con el nuevo aumento de texto tras pulsar \"OK\".
Nuevo nivel de aumento en el texto seleccionado. Cargando de nuevo las burbujas...
¿Disfrutas con Link Bubble? Por favor considera dejar una valoración en la tienda de aplicaciones.
Conviértete en Pro para obtener más.
¿Te gusta Link Bubble?¿Por qué no echas un ojo a mis otras aplicaciones?
Elimina %1$s como app por defecto para cargar %2$s links que contengan?\n\nAviso: Podrás seleccionar otra app como principal cuando vuelvas a clickar en el link %2$s .
Limitaciones del sistema Android impiden que Link Bubble selecciona este item.\nAbrir vínculo en %1$s?
Limitaciones del sistema Android impiden que Link Bubble selecciona este item.\nAbrir vínculo en un navegador.
Actualmente no hay soporte para este tipo de vínculo. Abrir página web en %1$s?
Actualmente no hay soporte para este tipo de vínculo. Abrir página web en un navegador.
Actualmente no hay soporte para este tipo de vínculo.
Las limitaciones del sistema (Android) previnieron el cierre de Link Bubble .\nAbrir en %1$s?
Las limitaciones del sistema (Android) previnieron el cierre de Link Bubble .\nAbrir en el navegador
Buscando información de los videos en Youtube...
No se puede recuperar la información acerca de los videos de Youtube en este momento. Por favor intente de nuevo más tarde.
¿Borrar el historial de navegación de Link Bubble entero?
Datos privados borrados. Cargando de nuevo las burbujas abiertas...
User Agent cambiado. Recargando las burbujas actuales...
Tu copia de Link Bubble ha sido modificado ilegalmente, por ese caso no podrá funcionar correctamente. Por favor reinstale la aplicación de la Play Store.
Se necesita Link Bubble Pro para cargar más de una pestaña al mismo tiempo. Desea mejorar a Pro?
Necesitas la versión Pro para cargar links de una o más aplicaciones. ¿Comprar la versión Pro?
Se detectó una licencia de Link Bubble Pro. Gracias por ayudar este proyecto, Disfruta de la aplicación :)
Bubble link copiada en el portapapeles.
No se ha encontrado un navegador por defecto
Presionar el botón atrás de tu teléfono es la forma más rápida. Arrastrar la burbuja al botón de cerrar es otro buen modo.
¡Creo que presionar el botón atrás debería minimizar el navegador!

Minimizing Link Bubble when the hardware Back button is pressed is not feasible. Consider the following case:
1). example.com/page1 is loaded in the first tab.
2). You click a link on this page, and load example.com/page2 in the same tab.
3). You now want to go back to the link in step 1.

How do you do this if pressing the hardware Back button minimizes Link Bubble? Pressing the tiny back indicator on the tab itself is not feasible.

Link Bubble is a browser, and Android browsers have a long since established standard of either going back in the URL stack, or if no such stack exists, closing the current page when the Back button is pressed. Link Bubble follows this standard.
Link Bubble no está interceptando links!

There are 3 causes of this:
1). A browser other thank Link Bubble is set as your default system browser. See the \"Set default system browser\" option in Link Bubble\'s Settings to change this.
2). The free version of Link Bubble only intercepts links from a single app. See the \"Intercept links from\" option in Link Bubble\'s Settings for which app this is or to change it. Note that by upgrading to Link Bubble Pro, links will be intercepted from all non-browser apps.
3). Apps such as Talon, Reddit is Fun and others have inbuilt browsers that render links. Check the settings of that app and enable \"External browser\" or deselect \"Integrated browser\" or similar.

Note: other browser apps such as Chrome are hardcoded to load links in themselves, and thus Link Bubble is unable to load links clicked from other browser apps.
¿Añadiras soporte para marcadores, favoritos, extensiones, etc...?
Never say never, but for now Link Bubble is focused solely on being the best possible way of loading and consuming links loaded from other apps.
When will you add foreign language translations? Can I help?

I hope to add translation support soon.

When I do, I will definitely put a call out on Google+ (+Chris Lacy) for help with translations, so be sure to keep an eye on my feed.
Do you publish a feature roadmap? Can I up-vote upcoming features?
For competitive reasons, the answer to both of these questions is \'no\' I\'m afraid.
Yo no tengo tarjeta de crédito, No puedo comprar por la Google Play. Cómo compro la versión Pro?

Link Bubble only supports purchases via Google Play at this time.

Additional payment methods will hopefully be added in the future (assuming they do not violate the Google Play Developer Program Policies).
Why can\'t I type the name of the link I want to visit?

This is entirely as intended. Link Bubble is designed not to be a complete replacement for your browser, but to instead be used to load and display links from other apps as elegantly, helpfully and as quickly as possible.

If you want to load a new url in Link Bubble, searching for a page via Google Now and loading the result with Link Bubble is a great way of doing so.

For quickly loading your favorites, I find the Chrome Bookmarks widget very helpful.
Why don\'t drop down menus work?

Unfortunately Android system limitations prevent this from working.

Technical answer: Android\'s WebView hardcodes <select> elements to display via a Dialog, which cannot be launched from a Service. WebView does not provide a means of overriding this behavior. Thus a hack has been added to simply disable drop down items from all pages in Link Bubble. This is far from ideal, but it is certainly better than having the app crash, which is what happens otherwise :\\
¿Por qué no puedo copiar texto de una página web?

Unfortunately Android system limitations prevent this from working.

Technical answer: Copy functionality works when using Android\'s WebView from an Activity, but not from a Service (which Link Bubble uses).
Why doesn\'t the app draw over the translucent status bar?
Desafortunadamente las limitaciones de Android previenen esto.
¿Hay un programa beta?¿Cómo accedo a él?
Details on the beta programme will be announced in due course. Keep an eye on my Google+ (+Chris Lacy) feed for announcements.
¿Por qué Link Bubble puede ir despacio en mi teléfono tipo Nexus S / Galaxy S1 / Moto G ?

Link Bubble is a very resource intensive app, and consequently devices with lower specs can struggle to run the app as well as more powerful devices. Future updates will aim to improve Link Bubble\'s performance, but there is only so much that can realistically be done here.

Technical answer: At the bare minimum, Link Bubble requires the use of a Service and a WebView in order to function. Often multiple WebViews and even multiple Activities are also present. Naturally, allocating these items (especially the WebViews) consumes a lot of memory/resources. Lower spec devices generally have less memory available than Link Bubble requires, and thus performance suffers as garbage collections are frequently triggered. As an example, the max heap size on the Nexus S is 48MB, compared to 192MB on the Nexus 5.
A veces las páginas web no cargan correctamente o los vídeos no se reproducen

LinkBubble uses the standard Android WebView, but unfortunately it is sometimes unreliable. Alternative web rendering methods such as FireFox\'s GeckoView and Chromium will likely be investigated going forward.

In the event a webpage doesn\'t display correctly in Link Bubble, the easiest thing to do is just to load a traditional browser for that link.
Why does the ongoing notification always display when Link Bubble is running?
Unfortunately this ongoing notification is necessary to encourage the Android OS not to terminate Link Bubble.

When it\'s ready!

It\'s not feasible to be any more specific than that unfortunately (even to provide a ballpark estimate).

The reality is, when estimates are given people often end up taking them as a commitment, and can get upset if/when a release slips for whatever reason.
Swipe from the top of the screen to open the notifications pane and click the \"Link Bubble\" notification.
¿Cómo puedo hacer que Link Bubble deje de ser el navegador por defecto?
Ajustes del sistema -> Aplicaciones -> Descargadas -> Link Bubble -> Borrar por defecto.
How does the Link Bubble Pro trial work?

• For the first 24 hours after Link Bubble is installed, non-Link Bubble Pro users will have access to all of Pro\'s premium features (multiple tabs, links being intercepted from any app, etc.).
• During this one-time trial period, Link Bubble Pro\'s premium features will be available for all of your devices.
• A timer displays on the top-left of Link Bubble\'s main screen, informing you how much time remains in your trial.
• People who tried Link Bubble before the 1.1 update are eligible for the trial period.
• For verification purposes, the Pro trial is linked to your email address. If no email address is found on the device, the trial period won\'t be available.
• Sorry, but your trial period can\'t be reset. Please enjoy full access to Pro\'s features in the first 24 hours after installing Link Bubble.
¿Alguna duda sobre la aplicación? Mira aquí
%1$s te quedan de tus 24 horas de prueba de Link Bubble Pro
%1$s está pidiendo ver tu locación. Permitir?
By continuing, you acknowledge that you accept the Link Bubble terms and privacy policy.

Unable to verify license.

Some causes of this problem include:
 • There is no Internet connection.
 • This application has been tampered with.

Check your Internet connection, and if necessary, try installing the app from the Play Store again.
Link Bubble Pro purchase verified!\n\nThank you so much for supporting me as I develop this project.

Google Play dice que esta copia de Link Bubble Pro es pirata..\n\nAsumiendo que eres buena gente y que has comprado la aplicación, el error más común en estos casos es que la cuenta de correo con la que compraste la licencia, no esta configurada en la Play Store de este dispositivo.

Note: you don\'t need to load Link Bubble Pro again, but you do need to keep it installed for verification purposes.\n\nThis app will be hidden throughout the system so it doesn\'t appear in your launcher(s).
Navegación web con el móvil bien hecha!
Link Bubble is an all-new browser designed and crafted solely with mobile devices in mind.

Features include: • When you click on a link in an app, Link Bubble loads that webpage in the background, leaving you free to keep using your current app rather than your precious time being wasted watching a page load. Once the page has fully loaded, it will animate on screen. • Link Bubble\'s flick physics allow you to go from clicking a link to sharing a link or adding it to a service such as Pocket in little more than a second! • Load multiple links from your current app at the same time (requires Pro). • Gracefully handles links that redirect to other apps. No longer does clicking an Instagram link in Twitter redirect to a full screen browser before loading Instagram! • Deep integration with the apps on your system. • Locates embedded YouTube videos on web pages, and provides a shortcut to load those videos directly in the YouTube app. • Handy stats that illustrate how much time you are saving by using Link Bubble.

Regarding the Location permission: This is required so that you might grant permission for a website to access your location (such as those with an embedded map). Link Bubble itself never accesses your location.
Link Bubble Pro unlocks the full feature set of Link Bubble.

Upgrades include: • Infinite number of tabs (free version is limited to just one tab). • Load links from all apps on your device (free version intercepts links from just one app). • Remove the upgrade incentives throughout the free version. • Support me so I get to make more of these apps :)
Note: For the first 24 hours after first installing Link Bubble, you will have access to all of Link Bubble Pro\'s premium features as a one-time trial.
Presiona un Link en alguna aplicación.
Una burbuja aparecerá en el borde de la pantalla y el Link cargará en el fondo. Tan pronto que la página esté cargada, Se mostrará.
It\'s that simple! With Link Bubble, you can keep using your current app rather than wasting your time watching links redirect and waiting for pages to load. What\'s not to love about that?
You can also quickly share a link or add it to an app such as Pocket:
Redirige enlaces a una aplicación dedicada (p.ej. Instagram).
Busca vídeos encrustados para que se abran fácilmente en la aplicación YouTube.
La versión gratuita te dejará probar el poder de Link Bubble, pero con la versión Pro puedes:
Cargar múltiples burbujas a la vez.
Cargar enlaces de todas las aplicaciones.
Ayuda a asegurar que pueda hacer más aplicaciones en el futuro :)
Gracias, y disfruta de la aplicación!
PD. Para cerrar la burbuja, pulsa el botón Volver o manten pulsado la burbuja y llevarlo a la burbuja de Cierre.
